item.title: Fast Madness
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Fast Madness is a fast-paced car avoidance game, get in your car and start your racing! You need to control the car, avoid those dangerous cars on the road, if you crash into them, you will lose. It’s hard, keep trying to get a high score and show your talent! Have a good time in […]
item.content:encoded:
Fast Madness is a fast-paced car avoidance game, get in your car and start your racing! You need to control the car, avoid those dangerous cars on the road, if you crash into them, you will lose. It’s hard, keep trying to get a high score and show your talent! Have a good time in Fast Madness!
Use mouse or tap to play

item.title: Truck Driver Easy Road
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Truck Driver Easy Road is not only a truck free driving but also a hard-core parking simulation game with 3D game art animation. Whether you want to drive in this town on the map nor proceed with the parking lessons is fine. Get in the truck and enjoy Truck Driver Easy Road! WASD or arrow […]
item.content:encoded:
Truck Driver Easy Road is not only a truck free driving but also a hard-core parking simulation game with 3D game art animation. Whether you want to drive in this town on the map nor proceed with the parking lessons is fine. Get in the truck and enjoy Truck Driver Easy Road!
WASD or arrow keys – drive, C – change camera, Y – wipers, U – mud flaps, V – hand brake, M – map, Right mouse button – horn, Hold the left mouse button and drag – camera overview, P – pause, R – open the window on the left, B – look back, L – light

item.title: Motocross Riders
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Motocross Riders is not only a motorcycle driving but also a multiplayer racing simulation game with 3D realistic game engine. You could select Free Mode to accommodate the track first without any pressure. Also, you could race with other players online in Multiplayer Mode. Have a good time in Motocross Riders!WASD or arrow keys – […]
item.content:encoded:
Motocross Riders is not only a motorcycle driving but also a multiplayer racing simulation game with 3D realistic game engine. You could select Free Mode to accommodate the track first without any pressure. Also, you could race with other players online in Multiplayer Mode. Have a good time in Motocross Riders!
WASD or arrow keys – control motocross, Esc – go to the main menu, Shift – use nitro, Space bar – brake

item.title: Pickup Simulator
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Pickup Simulator is not only a truck driving but also a parking simulation game that is made of 3D game art animation. You need to overpass each blue checkpoint in the valley. Finally, you need to park the vehicle subtly and carefully. Have a good time in Pickup Simulator!WASD or arrow keys – drive the […]
item.content:encoded:
Pickup Simulator is not only a truck driving but also a parking simulation game that is made of 3D game art animation. You need to overpass each blue checkpoint in the valley. Finally, you need to park the vehicle subtly and carefully. Have a good time in Pickup Simulator!
WASD or arrow keys – drive the pickup, C – change camera, Space bar – use handbrake

item.title: Cartoon Hot Racer 3D
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Cartoon Hot Racer 3D is not only a racing simulation but also a car driving with 3D cartoon game art animation. Your mission is to choose the driving job you like and enjoy the huge open world. You have a chance to experience the realistic physics game engine while driving. Have a good time in […]
item.content:encoded:
Cartoon Hot Racer 3D is not only a racing simulation but also a car driving with 3D cartoon game art animation. Your mission is to choose the driving job you like and enjoy the huge open world. You have a chance to experience the realistic physics game engine while driving. Have a good time in Cartoon Hot Racer 3D!
WASD or arrow keys – drive, B – look back, Shift – use nitro, Space bar – use handbrake, Esc – pause

item.title: Megalodon
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Megalodon is not only a third-person driving but also a collecting simulation game with 3D sea game art animation. It is required for you to hunt all the creatures in the sea like sea animals and even people! You know, the other animals like the octopus have a high swimming speed. It is not easy […]
item.content:encoded:
Megalodon is not only a third-person driving but also a collecting simulation game with 3D sea game art animation. It is required for you to hunt all the creatures in the sea like sea animals and even people! You know, the other animals like the octopus have a high swimming speed. It is not easy to catch them like clumsy fish in Megalodon!
WASD or arrow keys – swim, Left shift – fast swim, Space bar – attack, Escape – pause or resume, M – go to the menu

item.title: Mini Truck Driver Master
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mini Truck Driver Master is actually not a car driving game but a vehicle avoiding arcade game that is made of 3D pixel game art animation. In a traffic jam on this busy day, you are asked to drive your vehicles as long distance as you can on all the four tracks on the street. […]
item.content:encoded:
Mini Truck Driver Master is actually not a car driving game but a vehicle avoiding arcade game that is made of 3D pixel game art animation. In a traffic jam on this busy day, you are asked to drive your vehicles as long distance as you can on all the four tracks on the street. In fact, I strongly suggest you stay at the right two tracks slowly but easily get high scores. Please just entertain with Mini Truck Driver Master!
Tap – gas, Slide – change track

item.title: Truck Loader Online Master
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Truck Loader Online Master is a cartoon-style 2D game. Players need to drive the truck to move back and forth, transport the goods to the designated location, and then deliver the container to the truck. It is worth noting that some levels have only one container, and most There are many containers in the level […]
item.content:encoded:
Truck Loader Online Master is a cartoon-style 2D game. Players need to drive the truck to move back and forth, transport the goods to the designated location, and then deliver the container to the truck. It is worth noting that some levels have only one container, and most There are many containers in the level of, so players need to make good use of the magnet function to attach the goods to the iron products, and finally place the containers on the truck. This game requires great patience, wish you success!
use arrow keys and click the mouse to play.

item.title: Violent Race
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Start a new era of racing and continue the speed and passion on the road of excitement. In the game, in addition to competing with your opponent for the first place, you must also pay attention to the various obstacles set up on the way, and achieve a clever balance between the accelerator and the […]
item.content:encoded:
Start a new era of racing and continue the speed and passion on the road of excitement. In the game, in addition to competing with your opponent for the first place, you must also pay attention to the various obstacles set up on the way, and achieve a clever balance between the accelerator and the brake. That’s right, superb driving skills and a keen sense of crisis will make you invincible.
Tap – move

item.title: Violent Race
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Start a new era of racing and continue the speed and passion on the road of excitement. In the game, in addition to competing with your opponent for the first place, you must also pay attention to the various obstacles set up on the way, and achieve a clever balance between the accelerator and the […]
item.content:encoded:
Start a new era of racing and continue the speed and passion on the road of excitement. In the game, in addition to competing with your opponent for the first place, you must also pay attention to the various obstacles set up on the way, and achieve a clever balance between the accelerator and the brake. That’s right, superb driving skills and a keen sense of crisis will make you invincible.
Tap – move
